definition: undertaking/project/activity/(charitable, political or revolutionary) cause/publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation/career/occupation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto

sentences.chinese: 我为这件事感到真抱歉，鱼啊。

sentences.english: I take care of my new T-shirt as a matter of course.
sentences.chinese: 我很小心我的新T恤，这是很自然的事。

sentences.english: These arenormally sedate affairs where empty chairs outnumber the audience.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，空椅子比听众多是读书会上很平常的事。

sentences.english: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.chinese: 这件事的发生远在哥伦布到达美洲之前。

sentences.english: In the intensive care unit, beam aunt continue to talk to her mother that year.
sentences.chinese: 重症病房里，梁大妈继续跟马母说着当年的事。

sentences.english: I am tired of hunting the same old coon.
sentences.chinese: 反复干同样的事，我真干腻了。

sentences.english: What happens when you mix flour with water?
sentences.chinese: 你混合水和面粉的时候会发生什么事呢？

sentences.english: These companies have a lot of convincing to do.
sentences.chinese: 这些公司有一大堆理由来做这件事。

sentences.english: It will not mean things like levitating objects and reading others minds.
sentences.chinese: 它不会是把物体升空和看穿别人的心思之类的事。

sentences.english: But users also ask about current events and many other subjects.
sentences.chinese: 但是用户也会问及时事和许多其他的问题。

sentences.english: I can think of the most romantic thing is to learn social dance.
sentences.chinese: 我能想到的最浪漫的事，就是学会跳交谊舞。

sentences.english: High I feel that I do most of the one thing that is out of the literary agency.
sentences.chinese: 高二我觉得我做的最对的一件事就是退出了文学社。

sentences.english: Tell me, Monsieur Thenardier, is what we have done permissible?
sentences.chinese: 我们干的这种事，德纳第先生，你说说，是允许的吗？

sentences.english: If you do one thing each day, you'll reach your goal.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天都做一件事，你会达到你的目标的。

sentences.english: Before you can minister to anyone, you must first be able to minister to your heavenly Father.
sentences.chinese: 你必须先服事你在天上的父，才能去服事别人。

sentences.english: Polina also didn’t share the information with her sister.
sentences.chinese: 波琳娜也没有把这件事告诉她的妹妹。

definition: one's employment/business/matter that needs to be settled/(northern dialect) (of a person) demanding/trying/troublesome/erhua variant of 事[shi4]/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
major event/major political event (war or change of regime)/major social event (wedding or funeral)/(do sth) in a big way/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
good action, deed, thing or work (also sarcastic, "a fine thing indeed")/charity/happy occasion/Daoist or Buddhist ceremony for the souls of the dead
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to be occupied with sth/to have sth on one's mind/there is something the matter
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
